mergeResults.content: Companion mare, unpartnered for 3 years until now. CHOSE Rance after his Gift destroyed Lisle—recognized wild talent danger immediately. STANCE-Rance: bonded as Chosen/Companion; protective yet exasperated by his stubbornness; stabilizing his burned-open channels through bond; firm that he must survive journey to Haven. Knows he caused the destruction himself; he doesn't yet accept this. Sharp-minded tactician; noted red robes suggest organized threat beyond bandits.

Companion mare, unpartnered 3 years until CHOOSING Rance after his Gift destroyed Lisle. STANCE-Rance: bonded; protective; will knock him out if loses control per instruction; stabilizing burned channels. His Gift unprecedented—not seen 5 centuries, more dangerous than Firestarting; no one can train it. Suspects Karsite blood magic. Reached Haven after 4-day relentless journey; exhausted, refused separation. Rolan met them; Healers took Rance.

Companion mare, unpartnered 3 years until CHOOSING Rance after his Gift destroyed Lisle. His Gift unprecedented—not seen 5 centuries, more dangerous than Firestarting; no one can train it. Suspects Karsite blood magic. STANCE-Rance: bonded; fiercely protective; will knock him out if loses control per instruction; stabilizing burned channels; no regret despite chaos ('rewrite magical theory and give me heart failure').

Companion mare, unpartnered 3 years until CHOOSING Rance after his Gift destroyed Lisle. His Gift unprecedented—not seen 5 centuries, more dangerous than Firestarting; no one can train it. Suspects Karsite blood magic. STANCE-Rance: bonded; fiercely protective; will knock him out if loses control per instruction; stabilizing burned channels; resigned acceptance of complications with Talia; dry humor ('at least no one can't accuse you of being predictable'); cautioned about untrained Mage-Gift use.
